title: Upgradelights Black Silk Side Pleat 4 Inch Mini Clip On Chandelier Lampshade (3x4x4)
features: Shade Dimensions: 3 X 4 X 4 Inches (Top X Bottom X Slant Height. See "How to Measure Lamp Shade" below in product description). Size is ideal for chandelier or wall sconce.
Mini Retro Drum with side pleat Chandelier Lamp Shade Replacement. Ergonomically designed to project optimal light.
Rust-resistant brass flame clip (designed to clip on to a candelabra bulb). Suggested maximum wattage: 40 watts
Finely tailored black silk with gold interior and stylish box pleat emits soft, pleasing light, the perfect compliment to any decor.

American family owned small business, USA based customer service. Email us for the available quantity discounts. Orders before 12pm get shipped the same dayAmerican family owned small business, USA based customer service. Always next day free shipping from NC.
description: Create a clean, polished look with this Black silk side pleat mini chandelier shade. Fully lined soft gold interior and rust-resistant flame bulb clip. This classic shades will fit your chandelier small candle lamps and wall sconces perfectly. They use a flame clip to attach right to your bulb They are 3 inches across the top, 4 inches across the bottom and have a slant height of 4 inches. *Special Note: How to Measure Lampshade 1. Measure across the TOP of the lamp shade 2. Measure across the BOTTOM of the lamp shade 3. Measure along the SLANT HEIGHT (side) of the lamp shade.
